edu.ucla.sspace.hadoop
Class HadoopJob

java.lang.Object
  edu.ucla.sspace.hadoop.HadoopJob

public class HadoopJob
extends Object

A Hadoop utility class for executing a job in the Hadoop map-reduce engine. Users specify which classes to use for the mapping and reducing tasks and are then upon job completion, are return the files generated as output by those jobs. Mapper and Reducer instances may be configured by passing a Properties argument to this class's constructor. Any properties specified in this object are copied into the Configuration used for each job invocation.

Author:
David Jurgens

Method Detail

run

public HadoopJobResults run(Collection<String> inputPaths)
                     throws Exception
Exceutes the word co-occurrence counting job on the corpus files in the input directory using the current Hadoop instance, returning an iterator over all the occurrences frequences found in the corpus.

Parameters:
inputPaths - the directories on the Hadoop distributed file system containing all the corpus files that will be processed
Returns:
an iterator over the unique WordCooccurrence counts found in the corpus. Note that if two words co-occur the same distance apart multiple times, only one WordCooccurrence is returned, where the number of co-occurrences is reflected by the the getCount() method.
Throws:
Exception - if Hadoop throws an Exception during its execution or if the resulting output files cannot be read.
